job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongPosition strongData ScientistppstrongReports to strongHead of Data AnalyticsppstrongLocationstrong Onsite or RemoteppbrppstrongAbout RitualstrongppRitual is a directtoconsumer health brand that believes its crucial to know not just what youre putting into your body but why you need it in the first place Were transparent about our ingredients where theyre sourced from and have spent years conducting extensive research behind each of the premium nutrient forms we use Our products are simple effective and backed by science Our mission is simple to empower people to feel their best by turning healthy habits into a ritualppWe have built a team of curious skeptics worldclass scientists unconventional artists expert marketers and analytical strategists that are on a mission to reinvent an entire industry Were wellfunded growing quickly and committed to our mission If youre a team player who refuses to settle for the status quo we want you ppbrppstrongEssentialstrongppThe strongData Scientiststrong will be responsible for generating insights about Rituals customer lifecycle and site experience aiming to optimize acquisition customer retention and value You will work closely with the Director of Data Science and key stakeholders from product and customer growth on evaluating retention performance designing and analyzing AB test results working with analytics engineers to create new data models and exploring new data sources to add to our Analytic Data WarehouseppbrppstrongWhat Youll DostrongpulliLeverage event operational and survey data to understand customers identify opportunities to further elevate Rituals digital and subscription experience and create compelling data stories that drive actionliliPartner with internal teams on data informed hypotheses that will drive experiment design and readouts focused on causal relationships between product engagement and longterm customer valueliliOwn and drive KPIs focused on engagement and retention Integration of predictive LTV CAC churn and engagement scores into a cohesive management systemliliWork with other members of the team to leverage models and data products to help drive engagement and customer valueliliPartner with various stakeholders from consumer insights customer growth product and marketing teams on measurement strategy and data requirements Deliver actionable insights and holistic analytical stories to enhance customer growth and valueliulpbrppstrongWho You ArestrongpullistrongDetailedorientednbspstrongExcellent organizational skills and detailoriented lilistrongTeam PlayernbspstrongExceptional teammate who establishes positive working relationshipslilistrongCommunicationnbspstrongGood communication skills with the ability to express sophisticated concepts effectivelylilistrongMultitaskingstrong Demonstrated ability to multitask in a dynamic environmentlilistrongSelfStarter strongAbility to drive and lead a project with minimal supervision Ability to take initiative to uncover opportunities for improvementliulpbrppstrongWhat Youll NeedstrongpullistrongEducation strongBS or MS Degree in Computer Science Mathematics Statistics or a related technical fieldlilistrongExperience strong3 years of experience with SQL preferably working with Snowflake3 years of direct experience in an analytics and data science role using Python preferred2 years of experience with Business Intelligence tools such as Looker and Tableau with Looker preferredliliPractical experience establishing and utilizing data analytics standard methodologiesliliData science and machine learning model building experience with interest in broader Ecommerce projects such as recommendation engine attribution modeling demand forecast LTV modeling and customer segmentation is preferredliliExperience with DBT and Fivetran highly preferredliulpbrppbrppbrppstrongWhy RitualstrongppSince launching in October 2016 Ritual has grown to be a cultural revolution in the health industry Were not about pseudoscience halftruths or health fads We are simple effective and backed by real science We have some pretty great benefits amp perks related to our office environment however they have been limited due to the global health situation See below for our adjusted available perks until we can get back into the office togethernbsppulliEquity participationlilinbsp401k Match  Up to 4liliFree Ritual productsliliUnlimited PTO  10 days minimum to keep you freshliliBiAnnual Performance ReviewsliliRitual First Fridays
